portfolio.quote1: Photography is the story I fail to put into words. - Destin Sparks
portfolio.quote2: In photography there is a reality so subtle that it becomes more real than reality. - Alfred Stieglitz
portfolio.quote3: There is one thing the photograph must contain, the humanity of the moment. - Robert Frank
portfolio.quote4: Taking an image, freezing a moment, reveals how rich reality truly is. - Anonymous
portfolio.quote5: A portrait is not made in the camera but on either side of it. - Edward Steichen
portfolio.quote6: I never have taken a picture I’ve intended. They’re always better or worse. - Diane Arbus
